description:

description:
Applanga is a simple mobile app localization platform for adding new languages to your existing mobile apps. The Applanga SDK pulls all your translatable strings directly out of your app into the dashboard - you will never have to send files back and forth anymore while fighting to keep them in sync. 

With Applanga‚Äôs web dashboard, you can easily manage the different language versions of your apps, test the language live on the device, and push translations to users with just a few clicks. No need to rebuild, recode, or resubmit the app to the app stores. 

Keep control over your app by adding translations yourself, or give access to your team and associated translators. Use integrated machine translation or order professional translation services directly in the dashboard. 

Applanga works via a one-time SDK integration which allows you to edit, switch or add languages to your app with just a few clicks. Super fast and reliable localized apps. Unlimited apps, unlimited languages, unlimited phrases and unlimited users - simple MAU-based pricing.

description:
Molo is a Marine Management Software company operating out of New York City, founded by two entrepreneurs and lifetime boaters with over 15 years of combined experience in the technology industry. Molo‚Äôs mission is to deliver a modern platform for marine business management. Our guiding principles are ease of use, low cost, improved hospitality services, and real-time business intelligence. The functionality of Molo was guided by marine business owners and managers.

Molo is a cloud-based, business-facing application accessible via iPad and web browser that offers a simple way to manage transient and seasonal reservations, contacts, vessels, check-ins and payment processing dockside. Additionally, Molo provides automated billing paired with automated email messages for seasonal contract renewals, transient reservation confirmations, billing invoices, and more.

The founders of Molo are incredibly passionate about boating and see the need for better management and customer relationship tools in the industry. It is not uncommon for marinas to issue diner-style triplicate checks to boaters for the services provided, and to manage their accounts receivable using an Excel spreadsheet on a sole laptop.

We know we can do much better than that, and the initial feedback from early customers has confirmed that.

description:
Account Takeover Fraud costs businesses nearly 7 Billion a year.

We address the root cause. 

Our AI catches the scams that other vendors miss by visually examining millions of sites every day to detect online impersonation of your brand. Our solution finds credential theft (phishing), identity theft, payment data theft, personal information theft, and content re-publishing; and responds to mitigate the risk before your customers and your brand become victims.

Our unique deception technology takes the fight back to the scammers. We stop them in their tracks by injecting realistic decoy data right into their attack sites. That breaks the scammers‚Äô business model and helps to expose their real identities. Allure also provides best-in-class traditional responses via automated takedowns and blocklisting and a through our seasoned takedown team.

Head to our blog for more information about account takeover fraud, cybersecurity trends, and how to protect your customers from the bad guys: https://bit.ly/34fLRae
    200 5th Avenue,  Waltham, MA 02451, US
tagLine:

Understanding each agency's true cost is unique from (but essential to) the budget process and reimbursement of indirect expenditures (i.e. supportive or administrative costs, like HR and IT).

Whether you're a recipient of federal grants or of private foundation grants, our Allocate platform enables you to maximize indirect cost reimbursements, better understand your true cost of services, and create defensible, qualitative forecasts to determine which cost structure provides the greatest organizational impact.

description:
eCare Diary was created out of my experience as a care giver and care coordinator for my father who spent a decade suffering from Parkinson‚Äôs Disease.  I have spent over 20 years working in the health care system and I found coordinating long term care for my father, who was determined to live independently, to be cumbersome and difficult because of the lack of good information.  If a person who had worked for years in the US health care system had trouble navigating the world of long term care, I knew people without my experience must be having an even harder time.

eCare Diary is designed not just to be a website but also a community which provides comprehensive long term care information,  tools and resources to help people seeking and providing long term care.  Our unique feature is our Care Diary which is a set of online tools designed to make coordination of care and sharing of information amongst family members and other care givers easy.  The Care Diary gives multiple people access to the care recipient‚Äôs medical appointments, medications schedule, home care visits and other important items.  We also have a comprehensive database of nursing home and home care services, guides on long term care financing and information on important health care documents everyone should have.

As you deal with providing long term care for yourself or a loved one, I hope eCare Diary will be able to simplify the situation by providing you with the tools and information you need.

John Mills

description:
ObvioHealth is a global digital health organization providing real-world digital clinical trials that deliver better data.

Our mobile clinical study application allows for site-less trial design, allowing subjects to use their smartphones to participate in remote monitoring clinical trials from the comfort of their homes. For studies designed to include site visits, our application allows for continuous data collection in between visits to the clinic.

By bringing the trial directly to the mobile device of each participant, our study team engages subjects daily using text message and chatbot features. This interaction allows for open communication and helps subjects feel involved during virtual clinical trials.

The result: robust data collection, increased compliance, faster recruitment and improved time to completion.

To assist with collecting real world data in clinical trials, our app can easy link to various health devices. They include Apple watches, Fitbits and activity trackers, along with Bluetooth scales, blood pressure monitors, and smart health apps.

Participants can also use the app to schedule lab visits, or connect it with their PayPal account to receive compensation for decentralized clinical trials. And if the study team needs to talk with the participant during mobile clinical trials, the app allows for easy communication through chat or video.

description:
What is Uni-Pay?
Uni-Pay is an international payment solution that has been specifically designed to enable educational institutions to collect international student fees, without the need to pay international bank transfer charges or credit card fees. 

Uni-Pay enables overseas students to pay their fees quickly, easily and at a low cost, giving them a simple and secure way to pay in their local currency and through their local banking system. The service benefits from low cost, excellent exchange rates and, in most cases, no international transfer fees. 

The Uni-Pay service is delivered through a secure web portal that has two distinct component parts. These are an account management portal for the educational institution and a separate payment portal for the students. Both are linked together in the background to provide a single overall solution for the processing of student payments.

What are the benefits of Uni-Pay?

Uni-Pay can virtually eliminate the costs associated with receiving international bank transfers or credit card payments being applied to educational institutions. 
What's more, the student will benefit from preferential exchange rates, meaning that the amount they pay in their local currency will be significantly lower than it is through the standard banking and credit card channels - reducing the cost to the student as well as the educational institution.
    Unit 2, Olympic Way, Birchwood, Warrington, Cheshire WA2 0YL, GB

Hatsize is a leading cloud-based training labs provider that has successfully delivered over 2 million hours of hands-on software and hardware training for the world's most successful technology and training organizations including AHIMA, Certification Partners, Veritas, MicroTek, Symantec,and Tenable. 

Hatsize was founded in 2000 based on two key principles:

‚Ä¢Hands-on training and practice is more effective than just listening to an instructor or reading about a subject because it actively engages the student and accelerates real learning.

‚Ä¢Online learning is more cost effective than in-person training and it enables students to learn from anywhere.
 
Hatsize combined these two principles and developed a next generation training lab platform that can be used to deliver both instructor-led and self-paced training to students located anywhere in the world as a hosted cloud service or through a client‚Äôs own datacenters.
 
Before Hatsize, hands-on software and hardware training sessions were difficult to set up and expensive to deliver online, especially when they needed to be quickly customized and accessed by people in different locations.
 
Using Hatsize, training is much easier now. Hatsize offers an integrated cloud-based training lab platform that enables organizations to move all of their IT training ‚Äì both instructor-led and self-paced ‚Äì to the cloud and use Hatsize‚Äôs automated solution to manage it effectively.

description:
Sentireal¬Æ creates software applications to improve scientific education and training. Sentireal's software turns mobile and wearable devices into automated and personalised tutors.

By presenting educational media using augmented reality and virtual reality and incorporating continous background assessment of training progress, Sentireal's software applications provide improved learning outcomes and an inherently scalable learning solution.

Augmented reality involves overlaying a real-world scene captured by the sensors of a mobile device, for example its cameras and microphones, with computer-generated content including graphics, video, and audio. Virtual reality is a similar concept whereby the computer-generated content completely replaces the real-world scene.

Our aims are:

    To create educational media "on-the-fly" based on the learners current activities and real-world environment
    To automatically create educational media based on detailed personal aspects of each learner
    To improve learner understanding of the educational information using augmented reality and virtual reality presentation
    To automatically and implicitly assess learner progress without obvious examinations or quizzes
    Northern Ireland Science Park, Queen's Road, Belfast, Northern Ireland BT8 8BZ, GB
tagLine: Using Artificial Intelligence to provide personalised learning outcomes delivered by Augmented and Virtual Reality

AnChain.AI‚Äôs founding members have decades of experience in cyber-security, artificial intelligence, cloud computing, and big data having worked with stalwarts of the security industry: FireEye, Mandiant, EMC/RSA, Google, Amazon, Pivotal, Yahoo, and many more.

AnChain.AI provides around-the-clock protection, securing some of the world‚Äôs largest crypto exchanges, protocols, and DApps worldwide for several millions of dollars in weekly transaction amounts.

The Situational Awareness Platform (SAP) proactively protects crypto assets by providing proprietary artificial intelligence, knowledge graphs, and threat intelligence on blockchain transactions. The SAP is able to detect and even predict vulnerabilities and threats before they occur, enabling businesses to take proactive action.  In 2018,  AnChain.AI detected the first Blockchain APT (BAPT) hack in history which resulted in the theft of over $4 million worth of ETH.  The world's leading DApps trust the SAP to secure over $8 million in weekly transactions.

The Smart Contract Auditing Sandbox (CAS) is a cloud-based smart contract auditing sandbox that scans for over 30 of the most common smart contract vulnerabilities such as re-entrancy, overflow, and more.  Fully-automated and cloud-accessible, the CAS performs scans in just minutes and connects to professional auditing experts.  The CAS is trusted by the world‚Äôs leading crypto exchanges, protocols, and DApp developers, actively ensuring code and infrastructure integrity.

description:
It is time to change how networking is done and delivered. Volta Networks provides a product that turns around networking as we know it.

Networks are at a tipping point. IP networks, now, are the foundations for a new generation of services and connectivity. The whole infrastructure is becoming virtual, smaller, shorter lived and more dynamic. As a result, the number of network connections requested is massively increasing, placing unprecedented stress on data networks and network equipment.

Volta Networks is about to change all this. With the Volta Networks solution, customers will now be able to purchase commercially available low cost, high performance switch hardware known as white box switching. This is made possible by the Volta Networks Control Platform software, running either on the customer‚Äôs private cloud, or on the Public or Hybrid cloud. This enables customers to build large networking infrastructures that provide unparalleled levels of flexibility and scalability. Our customers can ride the wave of network forwarding platform enhancements, while maintaining a stable and robust software infrastructure, independent of the networking hardware itself.

Our approach allows us to dramatically cut the capital cost for network operators while also reducing their operating costs for things like software upgrades.  We also help speed the time to value for new services.
      Boston, MA  US
tagLine: The first cloud-native routing platform - reduces total cost of ownership by 90% compared to legacy routers,
specialisation: Autonomic Networking et Declarative API

description:

Who Are We?
getaroom.com was created to offer you the very best values at hotels and other types of lodging in major destinations worldwide. getaroom.com was founded by Dave Litman and Bob Diener, who also founded and ran Hotels.com. We understand that finding the right hotel is important to you and getting a great value can mean more savings for you to enjoy your trip. Whether you plan to travel for short or long trips, getaroom.com will be there as a resource for you to search, find, review, and book exactly what you want, at the best value. Our mission is to offer you the best rooms at the best values!
Our Hotel & Lodging Partners:

We specialize in great values for leisure travelers including families, small groups, sports and adventure travelers and those who want more space. We have a large offering of hotels and vacation rental properties including hotels, condominiums, time share resorts, condo hotels, suites and more. We work with both branded hotels and many independent, boutique and alternative types of lodging where we often find the very best lodging values.
Why Choose getaroom.com?

We cut through the clutter to bring you the very best values. Most travel sites overwhelm you with information, and provide a confusing range of travel products. You are often frustrated by the sheer volume of information and have a difficult time finding the best values. Our research shows that most of you want to be shown the best choices in your desired location.

getaroom.com focuses on a limited number of major destinations and selects the properties in each destination that offer you the very best values. By focusing on a select group of properties, we are able to negotiate better rates for you.

description:
Funambol is the leading provider of white-label digital lifestyle personal cloud solutions for mobile operators, device manufacturers, content providers and other companies that want to offer a personal cloud service to customers. The company's flagship solution, OneMediaHub, stores pictures, videos, music, files, contacts and calendars on smartphones, tablets and computers in the cloud, syncs them across devices, and allows sharing with other people and systems.

In contrast to other personal cloud services, OneMediaHub differs in four important respects:
1) as a white-label solution, it enables companies to go to market with their brand, and their users to store their data and content in the provider's cloud, conferring revenue and loyalty/retention benefits to the provider
2) it offers the most comprehensive capabilities and supports more types of data and content on more devices
3) it is highly flexible, enabling providers to differentiate, and allowing integration with billing & support systems

From overfishing and biodiversity loss to mislabelling and food origin scandals, the need for fully auditable traceability software across the seafood industry has never been greater.  With their origins in the seafood industry, Traceall Global has developed industry leading Net to Plate traceability solutions which are used in oceans across the globe to prevent IUU [Illegal, Unreported, Unregulated] fishing, drive sustainable and ethical practices, and deliver greater efficiencies to the fishing sector.

description:
OnTrack works with partners through a white-label SaaS model to engage with mass-market financial planning customers to help them think about retirement. The approach is user-centric, with an emphasis on health and psychological considerations as much as financial concerns. We find that users will provide all the necessary information for a full financial planning fact find - voluntarily and at their own pace - when they feel they are intimately involved in the entire process. Most of our research has been focused on the psychology of user engagement through a partnership with leading academics. The tool personality profiles users to help frame suggestions in the language they will be comfortable hearing. We work in partnership with our clients to introduce products and education at the right time, in the right way, to each user in a personalised manner. We also provide our clients with access to a portal to track users progress and interact with them through email templates.

The tool introduces the idea of human capital and why life insurance is important, as well as taking an academic approach to risk profiling using techniques developed for the Big 5 Inventory personality trait model. The calculation engine combines goals, choices and Monte Carlo simulations to show what retirement could look like for the user, provides a Retirement Check-up document and allows for ongoing engagement through email/SMS/chat support.

      Singapore,   SG
tagLine: Digital retirement planning for all
specialisation: digitalenagagement et retirementplanning

description:
Over the years, we‚Äôve been creating services and solutions that help Universities and companies improve E-learning outcomes. The main feature of our solutions is automated monitoring and analysis of human behavior in real time. This is possible thanks to key technologies - AI and Computer Vision.

What are these solutions and what problems do we solve?

Proctor AI
Online proctoring service - allows you to automatically record violations in the process of passing an exam or testing. It doesn‚Äôt matter, there 100 people on the exam or 1k and it doesn‚Äôt matter where they are. The main thing is a stable internet connection and connected webcam.

Neural network algorithms analyze human behavior and record the vast majority of violations (dozens of types and hundreds of their variations).

As a result, the customer receives a combined video with user identification and detailed analytical report of human behavior with markup on the video. The system analyzes both the physical behavior (looking away from the screen, voice sounds, the presence of unauthorized persons), and actions with the computer (window change, screen or audio channel sharing). 

But if someone‚Äôs life depends on the result of the exam, we cannot allow the AI ‚Äã‚Äãto decide its fate. Therefore, we have developed a proctoring service by people (proctors)- post-viewing video or exam control in real-time. Proctors review records and adjust the report made by neutral network. Adjusted reports are given back for training the neural network.

Examus EQ
A system for monitoring human attention and involvement. It processes videostream from the computer's or phone camera and transfers analytics to the server. Thus, the customer receives real-time analytics of human / audience behavior while watching training videos or during participation in a webinar.
An important feature is that it processes data directly on the client device, which minimizes the cost of computing resources and excludes the transfer of person data.
    2150 Shattuck Ave, PH, Berkeley, California 94704, US
tagLine: AI based E-proctoring for online exams and analyzing students engagement during online courses
specialisation: Education, Online education, Proctoring, Online testing, attention measurement, engagement measument et learning data analytics

description:
RailComm is a leading provider of  technology solutions to the world‚Äôs railroad industry.  

We have innovative software centric solutions that monitor, analyze, and control key assets of the rail infrastructure for both freight and passenger/transit railroads, including rail-served industrials, intermodal terminals, and ports.  

As other industries have done in the past, the railroad industry is rapidly moving to automation and data/information as core competitive differentiators.  RailComm, with our cloud-based (SaaS) and internet-of-things (IoT) solutions, is uniquely positioned to lead this trend.  

With our solutions our customers can achieve both increased efficiency and safety, two of the primary drivers of the industry.  With the ability to automate and analyze rail assets, our customers can optimize their resources more effectively and achieve significant increases in revenue and reduction in costs. 

Additionally, through effective automation they can achieve dramatic improvements in safety by eliminating risky and unpredictable manual or paper driven processes.  Our solutions include yard automation, computer aided mainline dispatching, remote condition monitoring and intelligent analytics for failure prediction.

Remote yard control  |  Mainline train control  |  Condition-based maintenance  |  Remote condition monitoring  |  Smart data analytics for failure prediction  |  Rail car tracking  |  Remote heater control  |  Remote track protection  |  Blue flag protection system  |  Shove track protection system.

description:
Elminda, is an inspiring brain-tech company addressing one of the ultimate challenges - understanding the human brain, paving a path for better brain health.

In the endless quest for ‚Äúbetter health‚Äù there are many methods of measuring every part of our bodies. But the brain is one area where real innovation is sorely needed. The inability to accurately measure brain function hinders the management of injuries like concussions, disorders like chronic pain and the discovery for effective therapies for Alzheimer's disease or depression. Importantly, it prevents us from taking ownership of our own brain‚Äôs health. 

Elminda is breaking those barriers with BNA‚Ñ¢ (Brain Network Analytics) technology, an electro-physiology based functional brain mapping, imaging and monitoring technology that finally allows medical professionals as well as patients and their families to SEE more, KNOW more and DO more, inspiring a revolutionary path to better brain health and creation of new standards for the assessment and treatment of brain related disorders. 

Elminda has spent a decade pioneering a fusion of big data analytics, artificial intelligence and brain network analytics mapping that can quantify function and dysfunction, disease progression, and therapeutic effects in cases of  neurological and psychiatric disorders such as depression or pain. 

BNA‚Ñ¢ was cleared by the FDA and CE Mark and is available for commercial and clinical use in the US, EU as well as in Israel. Elminda is a revenue stage company with a unique business model combining a medical device and high margin cloud-based Software as a Service (SaaS). The company employs a top team of employees with offices in both Herzeliya and Chicago. 

The company is widely recognized for its innovative approach to neuroscience, ranking among Fast Company‚Äôs annual list of the World's most innovative companies and a World Economic Forum Technology Pioneer.
tagLine: Shaping the future of BrainHealth today!

Cloudphysician is a healthtech company that is transforming the delivery of critical care. Cloudphysician uses its proprietary technology platform, RADAR, to connect command centers staffed with trained critical care personnel to ICUs remotely. These specialists use RADAR to monitor and manage patients 24/7, thereby improving the quality of care.

RADAR digitizes and analyses patient data in real time using computer vision, Natural Language Processing and provides clinical decision support to super specialist doctors at the command center who then recommend the appropriate treatment that needs to be directed to patients at ICUs connected to RADAR. Inbuilt in RADAR are diagnostic tools to assist doctors and automated early warnings that alert caregivers. This allows one doctor to monitor multiple patients at any given time, no matter the location - thereby addressing the quality of care, shortage of specialist doctors and improving outcomes of critically ill patients (measured by decrease in mortality rates, reduced complications, enhanced medication safety).

Shortage of trained medical personnel is a universal problem, and this shortage is particularly acute in India. It is known that critically ill patients require specialized care and access to an Intensivist improves patient outcomes. Cloudphysician's RADAR solution, designed for low resource settings, enables specialized doctors to leverage technology to increase access to quality ICU care. Given where many of these patients are located, they would not have otherwise had access to specialized doctors.

At Cloudphysician, we enhance the delivery of critical care services via adoption of smart-ICUs. This has resulted in improved patient satisfaction and operational efficiency of hospital ICUs. To learn more visit us at www.cloudphysician.net. If you are a hospital and would like to engage, write to info@cloudphysician.net.

We are hiring! Write to us at careers@cloudphysician.net
www.youtube.com/cloudphysician
    No 7 Bellary Road, Ganganagar, Bangalore, Bangalore, Karnataka 560032, IN
tagLine: Where technology meets healthcare
specialisation: Tele-medicine, Tele-ICU, Intensivists, ICU, Critical Care, Remote ICU care, SmartICU, RADAR, Healthcare technology, Health tech, Telemedicine et HDU

description:
Your Trusted Source For Lead Gen & Call Tracking Solutions
Since 1990, 800response has been offering 1-800 numbers, vanity numbers, and local tracking numbers to businesses across the United States. As the industry leader in shared-use services for 1-800 vanity numbers, 800response has the widest selection of vanity toll free numbers available today.

In addition to the core business of shared-use vanity toll free numbers, 800response offers a full solution suite of real-time call tracking reports, call recording, custom call routing arrangements, speech analytics, call scorecards, and speech to text call transcription through our company, CallFinder.

800response & CallFinder Speech Analytics Solutions
CallFinder is a division of 800response, and a leader in SaaS speech analytics technology, automated call scoring, and call transcription. CallFinder was born from years of experience and listening to our customers who told us they didn‚Äôt have the internal resources necessary to manually listen to enough call recordings to conduct meaningful analysis of their customer interactions.

So, we set off to develop a solution to solve that challenge. Now all 800response customers can use CallFinder‚Äôs automated quality monitoring solution to extract insights from their daily conversations with customers, and use those insights to make informed decisions and drive business growth.

Let 800response and CallFinder Help Your Business:
Improve lead generation
Capture lead analytics and valuable customer insights
Gain visibility into the voice of your customers
Monitor agent script and regulatory compliance
Analyze and improve business processes
Discover revenue opportunities

Who We Work With
Ranging from small and mid-sized businesses to large, multi-location dealer networks and franchise systems, and contact centers, we help businesses across all industries boost and optimize new customer acquisitions and interactions, measure and track campaign performance, and monitor the CX.

ReconArt is a single-solution technology company providing a modern, enterprise-class, fully web-based reconciliation platform to a diverse, global client base of all industries and sizes. Our firm is headquartered in the United States just outside of Washington DC and also has offices in Europe. We have been serving our clients and the market since 2011.
ReconArt‚Äôs integrated functionality supports and automates all aspects of the reconciliation lifecycle.: from administrative management and data integration, to robust transactional matching & exception management technology, to comprehensive, fully auditable balance sheet reconciliation, and other supporting functionality such as journal approvals and variance analysis. 
Through all this user-owned functionality, ReconArt supports any type of reconciliation, including but not limited to bank accounts, credit card, payments, GL/suspense, AR/AP, ledger to sub-ledger, intercompany, trades and positions, balance sheet. Our solution‚Äôs flexibility even allows for non-financial data to be reconciled and reported. 
Immediately after its first version release in 2011, ReconArt was adopted by several large banks and companies, establishing it as a leading solution in the reconciliation space. Many more great clients from across the globe have joined us since, featuring banking, financial services, fintech, travel, e-commerce, insurance as well as government and education entities.

description:
Storspay (StorsApp Pay) is a DeFi-crypto payments platform for merchants to receive payments in crypto and fiat from their consumers with almost zero transaction fees. 
Consumers only need their phone to make payments at participating merchants (anywhere in world) without needing a debit/credit card or hopping between multiple peer to peer crypto apps. They enjoy cashback on all their spend through the app at participating merchants.
Users can earn interest income (higher vs. their bank) by staking their balances to be lent at affordable rates to merchants in the network (who enjoy lower rates vs.  banks).
We are creating a new way for merchants and consumers to exchange value, one that puts them at the heart of their transactions while undoing the frictions of the current system through new paradigms- borderless payments, zero fees, cashback for spend and community-driven higher interest income on user balances and lower rates on merchant borrowing.
Storspay - its the way you want to exchange.

description:
Rubicon Labs is a cybersecurity startup founded by veterans of Apple and Broadcom with offices in San Francisco, California and Austin, Texas. 

Cyberwarfare is widespread in the cloud and now going kinetic. A quarter of a billion cars and some 25 billion devices will join the IoT by 2020. That means that cars, homes, and public spaces will join credit cards and PCs on the list of things that speak the same language. It also means they‚Äôll join the list of things that can be hacked.

Rubicon Labs is solving that problem with an IoT identity platform. 

Zero-knowledge keys are Rubicon Labs‚Äô core innovation. We uniquely couple a keyed one-way hash function with a secure memory space. This creates a provisionable vault with a key whose value is unknown, but still usable by the device. Our devices can construct zero-knowledge systems for digital identity and secure communication. Rubicon is using this innovation in key protection to solve the security challenges in IoT.
specialisation: Cybersecurity, Encryption, Key Management, Hardware Security Module, Key Protection, Security, Cloud, Internet of Things et data security

description:
Cohealo is a technology company that helps health systems share medical equipment across facilities, so they can optimize spend, accelerate cash flow, and improve access to care.

We were founded on the belief that collaboration among hospitals, using technology, could dramatically improve financial and clinical results.

We zeroed in on the massive inefficiencies around medical equipment. A health system typically spends tens of millions on equipment purchases and rentals annually. However, average utilization of 42% means most capacity remains idle. One hospital‚Äôs new spinal surgical table may gather dust, while a nearby facility cancels procedures due to equipment issues ‚Äì or sends patients away altogether.

Our solution combines a technology platform, analytics, and supporting logistics to make medical equipment available ‚Äì anywhere and anytime ‚Äì on-demand. Some call our approach the sharing economy or collaborative consumption. For us, it‚Äôs a step forward on our mission to make the best medical technology available to every patient on the planet.

description:
Our mission is to build technology for material hauling that optimizes the way material producers, haulers, and field crews collaborate.

Before HaulHub was born in 2015, founder and CEO Joe Spinelli operated his own heavy construction company. He ran it for nearly two decades, growing the business through the economic downturn by taking lean measures. As the construction industry‚Äôs demand for trucks increased, he continued to focus on improving operations and doing more with less.

To meet the growing demand for trucks, Joe and his team prototyped an internal automated tool to find and schedule trucks. This was the seed for HaulHub. Word about the new system spread among the close-knit construction community. Contractors and drivers alike hopped onboard.

In the spring of 2017, HaulHub took a major leap forward to see how its automated solution could help with the operations of one of the largest material producers in the Northeast. HaulHub has since grown to power over 1,000 plants and jobsites and we support some of the largest material producers and contractors in the industry. The solutions are more advanced and the business issues are more complex, but the premise is unchanged: run lean operations by doing more with less.
    120 St James Ave,  Boston, Massachusetts 02116, US
tagLine: The Gold Standard in Heavy Construction e-Ticketing
specialisation: Trucking, Logistics, Construction, Transportation, Dump Trucks, Fleet Management et Operations Management

description:
Our Vision 
Telmate is a leading provider of inmate communications services with a primary mission to create innovative technologies that lower recidivism by increasing the secured connections between inmates and their friends and family. Studies show that the more an inmate is connected to their community on the outside, the less likely they are to reoffend. As a result, every Telmate initiative is aimed at making more connections simple, affordable, positive and convenient.
Our tech innovations emerge from our headquarters in San Francisco, CA. We also have a 24/7/365 call center in Ontario, OR, and staff located throughout the US and Canada. Telmate provides SaaS inmate phones, video visits, messaging, photo sharing, education, entertainment and more in nearly 200 facilities in over 30 states and in Canada.
 
Customer Activity
During an average day the Telmate solution facilitates and records on average: 22 million data requests (or 15,000 data requests per minute) made up of usage such as: concurrent phone calls, video visits, messages sent and received, deposits, Telmate Investigator inquiries, recording downloads and much more. Telmate is the industry leader in installed secure, inmate wireless tablets, with installations in over 50 facilities, with the most usage in the industry. 
 
Community Outreach
Telmate is committed to supporting and honoring those on the front lines of corrections and law enforcement, as well as the communities we serve. Through our community outreach programs such as Telmate Cares, Telmate Heroes and Telmate Fallen Heroes, Telmate on a regular bases acknowledges and honors active and fallen officers. Telmate works closely with the Boys and Girls Club of Western Treasure Valley and recently served as a Badge of Honor Partner  at the National Law Enforcement Officers Memorial Fund‚Äôs National Police Week activities in Washington, DC.
    18th Floor,  San Francisco, CA 94111, US
specialisation: Telecommunications, VoIP et Video

Zimperium, the global leader in mobile device and app security, offers the only real-time, on-device, machine learning-based protection against Android, iOS and Chromebooks threats. Powered by z9, Zimperium provides protection against device, network, phishing and malicious app attacks. 

Our solutions include zIPS which runs locally on any mobile device and detects cyberattacks without a connection to the cloud and our first-of-its-kind Mobile Application Protection Suite (MAPS), a comprehensive solution that helps organizations protect their mobile apps throughout their entire life cycle. 

MAPS is comprised of three solutions: zScan, which helps organizations discover and fix compliance, privacy, and security issues; zShield, which hardens the app through obfuscation and anti-tampering; and zDefend (formerly zIAP), an SDK embedded in apps to help detect and defend against device, network, phishing and malicious app attacks while the app is in use.

Zimperium was the first MTD provider to be granted an Authority to Operate (ATO) status from the Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program (FedRAMP). Headquartered in Dallas, TX, Zimperium is backed by Warburg Pincus, SoftBank, Samsung, Sierra Ventures and Telstra. 

Learn more at www.zimperium.com or our official blog at https://blog.zimperium.com.

    4055 Valley View,  Dallas, TX 75244, US
tagLine: The leader in enterprise mobile endpoint protection and mobile app protection for Android, iOS and Chromebooks threats
specialisation: Mobile Security, Mobile Intrusion Prevention System, Vulnerability Research & Exploitation, Machine Learning, Mobile IPS, Mobile Threat Defense, Mobile Risk Management, Mobile Device Management, Mobile Intrusion Detection System et Mobile Threat Detection
